segments.text: Hello , I want to apply for the position of an usher in your restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Welcome . One of your duties is to know the number of the customer and accept reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else do I need to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You inform the people in charge and let them reserve dinning tables for guests .
segments.speaker: S2
